    Battery, RepairKit, SurpriseBox

    public abstract class Item
extends Element
    A class of items.
    Version:
    24 may 2012
    Author:
    Jonas Schouterden (r0260385) & Nele Rober (r0262954) Bachelor Ingenieurswetenschappen, KULeuven

      • canSharePositionWith

        public boolean canSharePositionWith(Element other)
        Checks whether this item can share a position with another element.
        Specified by:
        canSharePositionWith in class Element
        Parameters:
        other - The element where to this element may be in conflict.
        Returns:
        False if both this element is a robot and the other element is a robot. | if((this instanceof Robot) && (other instanceof Robot)) then result == false

      • takeHit

        public abstract void takeHit()
                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        When an element is hit (e.g. it is shot by a robot) some of its properties are altered. Which properties and to what extend, depends on the elements.
        Specified by:

        Throws:
